alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Cave Creek, New River; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 9:52PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1015 PM MST... At 951 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Circle City, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Circle City, Wittmann and Morristown. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 114 and 132. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 1 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aguila Valley; Cave Creek, New River; Northwest Valley
